definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The Calcium Oxide is used to mix oxygen with the molten steel.
sentences.chinese: 這些生石灰是用來將氧混合在熔化的鋼水中。

sentences.english: Humidity of quick lime above normal.
sentences.chinese: 生石灰溼度高於正常值。

sentences.english: A solution of copper sulfate and quicklime used as a fungicide .
sentences.chinese: 硫酸銅和生石灰的溶液，用作殺真菌劑。

sentences.english: In addition, effective site management, prevent lime piece from mixing into aggregate.
sentences.chinese: 加強現場管理，防止碎石中混入生石灰塊。

sentences.english: Do not use slaked lime or unslaked lime.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用生石灰或是熟石灰。

sentences.english: And test the soil before adding lime and fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: 在添加生石灰和肥料前，先檢測一下土壤。

sentences.english: A new type of burnt lime slaker have been developed by LAIGANG sintering plant.
sentences.chinese: 萊鋼燒結廠研製了一種新型的生石灰消化器。

sentences.english: Quick lime powder should be timely change.
sentences.chinese: 生石灰變粉應及時改換。

sentences.english: Quicklime combines with water to form slaked lime.
sentences.chinese: 生石灰與水化合成爲消石灰。

sentences.english: Calcium lime and slacked lime have different results to excite the activity of fly ash.
sentences.chinese: 生石灰和熟石灰對粉煤灰活性激發的效果是不同的。

sentences.english: In addition, effective site management, prevent lime piece from mixing…
sentences.chinese: 加強現場管理，防止碎石中混入生石灰塊。

definition: trichlorphon C4H8Cl3PO4, organic phosphate used as insecticide/also called dipterex
